DINOBOT sat to the back as th=
e MAXIMALS went to go down teh tunnel.  IF there was an ambush ahead, then =
they would take the brunt of it, and any hidden defenses would target and a=
ttrite them first.  While also giving the PREDACONS effective control of th=
e tunnel up to the surface in case a quick escape was needed or other uses =
could be maintained for it.

Speaking over to TORCA, "I would assume a ques=
tion of geology.  Their facility, if it is such, is probably underground qu=
ite simply as that is where the most stable ground is.  Aboveground things =
are too muddy for a solid base iwthout using heavy technology to establish =
it.  Which wold be more noticable to outside analysis.  So they have a stab=
le base in the caverns.  It also may have to do something with their jammin=
g technology as well."
